title: The Fugitive S01E06 Decision in the Ring DVDRip DivX
description:
The Fugitive Season 1 (1963)
S01E06 Decision in the Ring

First aired: 10/22/1963 
Kimble finds work as a cut man for boxer Joe Smith. Joe confides in Kimble that he wanted to be a doctor, but he chose boxing because he felt that being a black man would be an obstacle in the world of medicine. When Kimble discovers that Joe is suffering from memory loss, both he and Joe&#039;s wife, Laura, fear that Joe might have brain damage from his boxing. Meanwhile, a police detective, named Henry Stone, goes undercover as a sports writer to investigate Joe&#039;s manager, Lou, for possible mob ties. But when a boxing worker tips off Stone that someone might be wanting Joe to throw his next fight, the detective investigates Kimble.James Dunn, Ruby Dee guest star.

Cast: David Janssen as Dr. Richard Kimble, Barry Morse as Lt. Philip Gerard, Bill Raisch as Fred Johnson (The One-Armed Man), Diane Brewster (flashbacks) as Helen Kimble, J.D.Cannon as Lloyd Chandler, William Conrad as Narrator (voice)

Guest cast: James Edwards (Joe Smith), Ruby Dee (Laura Smith), James Dunn (Lou Bragan), Robert F. Simon (Murphy), Ed Kemmer (Hank Stone), Harry Swoger (Wally Wilson), Hari Rhodes (Dan Digby)
